001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus;
002
003import com.google.common.base.Preconditions;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest;
009
010import java.math.BigInteger;
011import java.util.HashSet;
012import java.util.Set;
013
014/**
015 * Response message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}, opCode 71, size 8
016 *
017 * <br>
018 *
019 * 
020 * <table border='1'>
021 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
022 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>71</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
023 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>8</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
024 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#RESPONSE}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
025 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>request</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.AlarmStatusRequest}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
026 * </table>
027 */
028@MessageProps(
029        opCode=71,
030        size=8,
031        type=MessageType.RESPONSE,
032        request= AlarmStatusRequest.class
033)
034public class AlarmStatusResponse extends Message {
035    private BigInteger intMap;
036
037    // private val unused, but placed to force java tostring to include the formatted alerts set
038    private Set<AlarmResponseType> alarms;
039
040    public AlarmStatusResponse() {}
041
042    public AlarmStatusResponse(BigInteger intMap) {
043        this.cargo = buildCargo(intMap);
044        parse(cargo);
045    }
046
047    private static byte[] buildCargo(BigInteger byte0uint64) {
048        return Bytes.toUint64(byte0uint64.longValue());
049    }
050
051    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
052        Preconditions.checkArgument(raw.length == props().size());
053        intMap = Bytes.readUint64(raw, 0);
054        cargo = raw;
055        alarms = getAlarms();
056    }
057
058    public BigInteger getIntMap() {
059        return intMap;
060    }
061
062    public enum AlarmResponseType {
063        CARTRIDGE_ALARM(0),
064        CARTRIDGE_ALARM2(1),
065        OCCLUSION_ALARM(2, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
066        PUMP_RESET_ALARM(3, "The pump was reset. IOB has been reset to 0 and CGM may need to be re-activated."),
067        DEFAULT_ALARM_4(4),
068        CARTRIDGE_ALARM3(5),
069        CARTRIDGE_ALARM4(6),
070        AUTO_OFF_ALARM(7, "Pump will stop delivering insulin automatically soon because no user activity has occurred and the auto-off setting is enabled."),
071        EMPTY_CARTRIDGE_ALARM(8, "Cartridge is out of insulin and insulin delivery cannot occur. Please fill a new cartridge."),
072        CARTRIDGE_ALARM5(9),
073        TEMPERATURE_ALARM(10),
074        TEMPERATURE_ALARM2(11),
075        BATTERY_SHUTDOWN_ALARM(12, "Pump battery level is critically low and the device will shut down. Please charge pump immediately."),
076        DEFAULT_ALARM_13(13),
077        INVALID_DATE_ALARM(14),
078        TEMPERATURE_ALARM3(15),
079        CARTRIDGE_ALARM6(16),
080        DEFAULT_ALARM_17(17),
081        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM(18, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
082        DEFAULT_ALARM_19(19),
083        CARTRIDGE_ALARM7(20),
084        ALTITUDE_ALARM(21),
085        STUCK_BUTTON_ALARM(22),
086        RESUME_PUMP_ALARM2(23, "Insulin delivery is currently off. Please restart insulin delivery soon."),
087        ATMOSPHERIC_PRESSURE_OUT_OF_RANGE_ALARM(24),
088        CARTRIDGE_REMOVED_ALARM(25, "The cartridge was removed from the pump. Please fill a new cartridge."),
089        OCCLUSION_ALARM2(26, "An occlusion has occurred. Please check your pump site and tubing and restart insulin delivery."),
090        DEFAULT_ALARM_27(27),
091        DEFAULT_ALARM_28(28),
092        CARTRIDGE_ALARM10(29),
093        CARTRIDGE_ALARM11(30),
094        CARTRIDGE_ALARM12(31),
095        DEFAULT_ALARM_32(32),
096        DEFAULT_ALARM_33(33),
097        DEFAULT_ALARM_34(34),
098        DEFAULT_ALARM_35(35),
099        DEFAULT_ALARM_36(36),
100        DEFAULT_ALARM_37(37),
101        DEFAULT_ALARM_38(38),
102        DEFAULT_ALARM_39(39),
103        DEFAULT_ALARM_40(40),
104        DEFAULT_ALARM_41(41),
105        DEFAULT_ALARM_42(42),
106        DEFAULT_ALARM_43(43),
107        DEFAULT_ALARM_44(44),
108        DEFAULT_ALARM_45(45),
109        DEFAULT_ALARM_46(46),
110        DEFAULT_ALARM_47(47),
111        DEFAULT_ALARM_48(48),
112        DEFAULT_ALARM_49(49),
113        DEFAULT_ALARM_50(50),
114        DEFAULT_ALARM_51(51),
115        DEFAULT_ALARM_52(52),
116        DEFAULT_ALARM_53(53),
117        DEFAULT_ALARM_54(54),
118        DEFAULT_ALARM_55(55),
119        DEFAULT_ALARM_56(56),
120        DEFAULT_ALARM_57(57),
121        DEFAULT_ALARM_58(58),
122        DEFAULT_ALARM_59(59),
123        DEFAULT_ALARM_60(60),
124        DEFAULT_ALARM_61(61),
125        DEFAULT_ALARM_62(62),
126        DEFAULT_ALARM_63(63)
127
128        ;
129
130        private final int bitmask;
131        private final String description;
132        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask) {
133            this.bitmask = bitmask;
134            this.description = null;
135        }
136        AlarmResponseType(int bitmask, String description) {
137            this.bitmask = bitmask;
138            this.description = description;
139        }
140
141        public int bitmask() {
142            return bitmask;
143        }
144        public String getDescription() {
145            return description;
146        }
147
148        public static BigInteger toBitmask(AlarmResponseType ...types) {
149            BigInteger ret = BigInteger.ZERO;
150            for (AlarmResponseType type : types) {
151                ret = ret.setBit(type.bitmask());
152            }
153
154            return ret;
155        }
156
157        public static Set<AlarmResponseType> fromBitmask(BigInteger intMap) {
158            Set<AlarmResponseType> current = new HashSet<>();
159            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
160                if (intMap.testBit(type.bitmask())) {
161                    current.add(type);
162                }
163            }
164
165            return current;
166        }
167
168        public static AlarmResponseType fromSingularId(long id) {
169            for (AlarmResponseType type : AlarmResponseType.values()) {
170                if (id == type.bitmask()) {
171                    return type;
172                }
173            }
174            return null;
175        }
176
177        public String toString() {
178            return name();
179        }
180    }
181
182    public Set<AlarmResponseType> getAlarms() {
183        return AlarmResponseType.fromBitmask(getIntMap());
184    }
185}
